description: Model selection rules for automated task optimization. Applied during orchestration only. Includes context tier mappings for adaptive loading.

compress.rationale: Text compression, summarization, and condensing tasks benefit from Haiku's speed and cost efficiency

contextTierMappings.description: Maps models to default context tiers for adaptive loading. User preferences and task complexity can override.

haiku.rationale: Haiku excels with minimal context for speed and cost efficiency

sonnet.rationale: Sonnet balances context depth with performance

opus.rationale: Opus handles comprehensive context for complex strategic tasks

complexityOverrides.description: Bumps context tier based on task complexity

rules.rationale: Complex tasks need more context even with Haiku
Complex tasks benefit from full context with Sonnet

explicitOverrides.description: User can explicitly request tier via prompt keywords

metadata.author: system
metadata.notes: v1.1 adds context tier mappings for adaptive loading (Memory Optimization v4.1). Orchestration rules remain unchanged.
